node.title: Extra Armor
node.description: |color|Reduces incoming damage by 50%.|colorend|

node.title: Citizen Health Plan
node.description: |color|All citizens have 100 times more |health|.|colorend|

node.title: Electrocyte!
node.description: |color|Automatically zaps nearby hostiles with bolts of electricity.|colorend|

node.title: Shadow Blend
node.description: |color|Enemies cannot see you while you remain in the dark.|colorend|

node.title: Liam the Laser Drone
node.description: |color|A friendly companion drone armed with a laser assists you.|colorend|

node.title: Good Heart
node.description: |color|150% more health.|colorend|

node.title: Tactical View
node.description: |color|The game view is top-down and the camera is pulled back a bit.|colorend|

node.title: Hacking Tool
node.description: |color|Hack terminals, turrets, and other equipment.|colorend|

node.title: Riot Shield
node.description: A riot shield that |color|blocks all frontal damage up to 200|health| before breaking.|colorend|

node.title: Fast Legs
node.description: |color|20% speed increase.|colorend|

node.title: Bullet Dodger
node.description: |color|Enemy projectiles move 30% slower|colorend| making them easier to dodge.

node.title: Shrinkify
node.description: |color|You are 30% smaller.|colorend| Benefits: smaller target, fit into smaller spaces, aim height at crotch level.

node.title: Chameleon
node.description: |color|You are undetectable while stationary.|colorend| Enemies will still notice you if they bump into you.

node.title: Pyromaniac
node.description: |color|Immunity to fire damage.|colorend| Fires you start have |color|4x burn time.|colorend|

node.title: Wall Breaker
node.description: |color|You can destroy walls and other breakable objects by running through them.|colorend|

node.title: Gina the Gatling Drone
node.description: |color|A drone armed with a machine gun assists you.|colorend|

node.title: Fizzled Range
node.description: |color|Enemy projectiles have a 30% shorter range|colorend|.

node.title: Friend of Mine
node.description: |color|Instead of triggering mines, they become your friends!|colorend|

node.title: Revenger
node.description: |color|All damage to you is dealt back TEN TIMES to the enemy who hurt you.|colorend|

node.title: Vampiric DeSade
node.description: |color|Drain |health| from everything around you.|colorend|

node.title: Tainted Glass
node.description: |color|Enemies don't see you through glass.|colorend|

node.title: Shield
node.description: A regenerating force field |color|blocks 30 points of damage|colorend|.

node.title: Stunning Pain
node.description: |color|Increases all damage against stunned targets by 300%.|colorend|

node.title: Pyrotechnician
node.description: |color|Exploding barrels explode with 20% larger radius and deal twice the damage.|colorend|

node.title: Gib Profit
node.description: Get |#ffff00|25|#ffffff||img src='ui/gfx/credits.png'| bonus for each |color|body you gib with explosives.|colorend|

node.title: Rythless
node.description: Everything is |color|fast and rythless|colorend|. You deal massive damage, but won't survive a single hit.|colorend|

node.title: DeSade
node.description: |color|Gain |health| equal to 20% of damage done.|colorend|

node.title: Explosion Immunity
node.description: |color|Immunity to explosions.|colorend| A direct rocket hit will still hurt you. They're sharp.

node.title: Groupies
node.description: |color|You have two gang member companions.|colorend|

node.title: Reaper
node.description: |color|Damage dealt to enemies with 50% or less |health| left is doubled.|colorend|

node.title: Damage Credits
node.description: |color|Credits drop when you deal damage to non-static objects.|color|

node.title: Rita the Rocket Drone
node.description: |color|A reckless drone armed with rockets 'assists' you.|colorend|

node.title: GIANT!
node.description: |color|You are giant sized with more health and melee damage|colorend|. You may not fit through doors though.

node.title: Reflex Booster
node.description: |color|Time doesn't move unless you do.|colorend| The booster unit has no cooling so it may get super hot.

node.title: Companion Boost
node.description: |color|All companions get +50%|health| and +20% in firerate and damage.|colorend|

node.title: Superhero
node.description: |color|You are invulnerable for the first 15 seconds of the mission.|colorend|

node.title: Medical Tool
node.description: |color|Heal friends and companions in close proximity when standing still.|colorend|

node.title: Immortality
node.description: |color|Regenerate 5|health| per second.|colorend| Triggers 2.5 seconds after taking damage.

node.title: Sickness
node.description: |color|Enemies within the mission zone start with 50% less |health|.|colorend|

node.title: Lights Out!
node.description: |color|The lights get dimmer|colorend| enabling you to sneak in shadows more easily.

node.title: Slowdown Field
node.description: Enemies within the field |color|walk slowly|colorend|. Combos with |color|Friend of Mine.|colorend|

node.title: Reload Plasma
node.description: |color|Fires 360 degree plasma bolts each time you start reloading.|colorend|

node.title: Citizen Safe Ammo
node.description: |color|Your projectiles won't harm citizens.|colorend| Your explosions might though.

node.title: Killing Heals
node.description: |color|Heals 10|health| each time your projectiles kill a target.|colorend|

node.title: Rapid Fire
node.description: |color|Increases rate of fire by 20%.|colorend|

node.title: Sandman
node.description: Each shot has a |color|20% chance to stun|colorend| the target it hits.

node.title: Piercing Lead
node.description: |color|Your non-shotgun lead projectiles pierce through walls.|colorend| Does not affect laser, plasma, or ion.

node.title: Extra Specials
node.description: |color|You get 50% more special weapon uses per mission.|colorend|

node.title: Power Gavel
node.description: |color|Increases melee damage by 300%.|colorend|

node.title: Paperthin
node.description: |color|Non-shotgun LEAD projectiles pierce enemies,|colorend| but do |#ff0000|20% less damage. |#ffffff|Does not affect laser, plasma, or ion.

node.title: Melee Deflect
node.description: |color|You can deflect projectiles with well timed melee attacks.|colorend|

node.title: Long Range
node.description: |color|Your projectile range is increased by 50%.|colorend|

node.title: Bull Shot
node.description: |color|Your projectiles knock back enemies.|colorend| Good for keeping those melee bangers at bay. Does not apply to laser or ion.

node.title: Dynamite Gavel
node.description: |color|Your melee attacks cause an explosion on each hit.|colorend|

node.title: Fast Reload
node.description: |color|Weapon reload speed is increased 300%.|colorend|

node.title: Pain Gavel
node.description: |color|Increases melee damage by 1000% but lowers your |health| by 75%.|colorend|

node.title: Overcharge
node.description: |color|Ion weapon shock range is increased 25% and damage is doubled.|colorend|

node.title: Mighty Burst
node.description: |color|Increases rate of fire by 50% but slows down reload by 25%.|colorend|

node.title: Extended Magazine
node.description: |color|Weapon magazine size is TRIPLED.|colorend|

node.title: Melee Knockback
node.description: |color|Your melee attacks knock back enemies.|colorend|

node.title: Tough Reloader
node.description: |color|You are invulnerable while reloading your weapon.|colorend|

node.title: Lovestruck
node.description: |color|Your melee attacks may persuade the enemy|colorend| to become your ally.

node.title: Fast Melee
node.description: |color|Your melee attacks are 100% faster.|colorend|

node.title: Explosive Bullet
node.description: |color|The first round in every magazine explodes on impact.|colorend|

node.title: Blood Specials
node.description: |color|Special fire uses 25% of maximum |health|.|colorend| This does not happen if you have special uses left.

node.title: Crisis Protocol
node.description: |color|Your normal projectiles inflict double base damage when your health is under 50%.|colorend|

node.title: Splinter Bullets
node.description: Your projectiles will |color|split in two|colorend| shortly after leaving the barrel.

node.title: Flaming Plasma
node.description: |color|Increases PLASMA damage by 30%.|colorend| Plasma shots set |color|enemies on fire.|colorend|

node.title: Murderous Lead
node.description: |color|Increases LEAD weapon damage 20%.|colorend| Does not apply to ion, laser, or plasma weapons.

node.title: HP
node.description: Increases health and damage. (For companions)

node.title: Radar
node.description: |color|Shows all potential threats in the map during mission pause screen.|colorend|

node.title: Bluebird
node.description: Energy regenerates rapidly.

node.title: Razor
node.description: Triple rate of fire and quadruple bullet mass!

node.title: Vampiric DeSade
node.description: Suck life from everything around you.

node.title: Depleted Uranium Bullets
node.description: Shoot through everything with DU bullets!

node.title: Rof Spider
node.description: Triple rate of fire

node.title: Boss Explosives Scaler
node.description: Boss Explosives Scaler

array.desc: Not used in game, here for safekeeping.

node.title: Loss Assessment
node.description: |color|One dead hostage is considered an acceptable loss.|colorend|

node.title: Instant Move Direction Change
node.description: |color|You can change move direction instantly.|colorend| This allows you to dodge projectiles better.

node.title: Assault Pod
node.description: |color|Rather than the actual entry point, you arrive at middle of the map|colorend|

node.title: Magazine Feeder
node.description: |color|Your ammo clips are 50% smaller, but reloading speed is upped by 70%|colorend|

node.title: Citizen Attractor
node.description: |color|Citizens follow you instead of running automatically to the exit.|colorend|.

node.title: Fast Damage
node.description: |color|The faster you move, the more damage you do.|colorend|

node.title: Credits to Health
node.description: |color|You get 10|health| every time you collect single large |credits| chip worth 100|credits| or more.|colorend|

node.title: Credits Immortality
node.description: |color|You are invulnerable 2 seconds each time you collect credits.|color|

node.title: Explosive Companions
node.description: |color|Your companions explode on death.|colorend|

node.title: Faster Companions
node.description: |color|Your companions move 30% faster.|colorend|

node.title: Confiscation Specialist
node.description: |color|There are credits laying around here and there waiting to be confiscated.|colorend|

node.title: Fire Boots
node.description: |color|You leave a burning trail of fire as you move.|colorend|

node.title: Money Damage
node.description: |color|Your damage is increased 1% for every 100 credits you collect during mission.|colorend|

node.title: Bloody Mess
node.description: |color|Your critical hits deal 3x more damage. All your foes are gibbed on death each time.|colorend|

node.title: Armor Engraved Badge
node.description: |color|Enemies take 50% longer to start firing at you.|colorend|

node.title: Heroic Death
node.description: |color|Dying counts as successful escape for other than main objectives. You get the medals even if you die.|colorend|

node.title: Exploding Devices
node.description: |color|All destroyable devices such as computers explode dealing demage when destroyed.|colorend|

node.title: Destructible Laser Traps
node.description: |color|All laser traps are destructible.|colorend|

node.title: Faster Faster
node.description: |color|Time runs faster, but you do 50% more damage all around.|colorend|

node.title: Defuser
node.description: Completely neutralise any explosive you touch.

node.title: Boombox
node.description: Constantly blast loud noise to attract everyone's attention.

node.title: Heat Suit
node.description: You appear the same temperature as your surroundings so turrets can't see you. (turrets would probably need to see SHADOW_BLEND and CHAMELEON_SKIN)

node.title: Fire Protection
node.description: |color|Total protection from fire damage|colorend|.

node.title: Medical Enhancer
node.description: |color|You get 150% more health from autodocs and medikits.|colorend|

node.title: Gib Money
node.description: |color|Get 150 credit bonus for each body you'll gib with explosives.|colorend| Streams your POV to media corps distributing Real Hurt(TM) programs.

node.title: More Explosives
node.description: |color|There will be a lot more explosive barrels etc in the mission.|colorend|

node.title: Melee Range Increase
node.description: |color|Increases your melee attack range by 20%.|colorend|

node.title: Reload Sprinting
node.description: |color|You sprint while reloading a weapon.|colorend|

node.title: Silencer
node.description: Firing your guns doesn't attract attention.

node.title: Gavel of Horror
node.description: |color|Enemies seeing your melee attack have 25% chance to run away in fear.|colorend|

node.title: Flaming Gavel
node.description: |color|Melee attack has a chance to set target in flames.|colorend|

node.title: Firestarter
node.description: |color|Fires you start have 4X burn time.|colorend|

node.title: Melee Rush
node.description: |color|You are invulnerable 1 second after each successful hit to an enemy.|colorend|

node.title: Incendiary Bullets
node.description: |color|Critical hits set enemies on fire for 3 secs.|colorend|

node.title: Dual Fire
node.description: |color|Your weapon shoots dual projectiles coming out from the barrel at 15 degree angle.|colorend|

node.title: Melee Subdue
node.description: |color|Your melee attacks knock enemies unconscious instead of dealing damage.|colorend| One hit is enough to put most criminals to sleep.

node.title: Decrease Weapon Spread
node.description: |color|Your weapons are more accurate producing less spread. Shotgun weapon cones are also tighter.|colorend|

node.title: Melee 360
node.description: |color|Your melee attacks hit everyone around you, not just the direction you're attacking.|colorend|

node.title: Flaming Plasma
node.description: Your |color|plasma based weapons set enemies on fire|colorend| on hit.

node.title: Secondary Uses Give Health
node.description: |color|You get 10|health| each time you use secondary weapon.|colorend|

node.title: Credits to Uses
node.description: |color|You get one secondary weapon use each time you collect large |credits| chip worth 100|credits| or more.|colorend|

node.title: Rescue to Use
node.description: |color|You get three secondary weapon uses each time you rescue a civilian.|colorend|

node.title: More Secondary Uses
node.description: |color|You get 3 extra secondary weapon uses per mission.|colorend|

node.title: Kill to Use
node.description: |color|Get one secondary weapon use for every 10 enemies killed.|colorend|

node.title: Ability Damage Increase
node.description: |color|Increase secondary weapon damage by 25% if applicable.|colorend|

node.title: Less Is More (Damage)
node.description: |color|Increase secondary weapon damage by 200% if applicable, but you have 50% less uses.|colorend|

node.title: Secondary Use Invisiblity
node.description: |color|You are totally invisible for 4 seconds each time you use secondary weapon. No enemy is able to track you even if you shoot or melee them.|colorend|

node.title: Secondary Uses Invulnerability
node.description: |color|You are invulnerable 2 seconds after each secondary weapon use.|colorend|
